item.title: Kubernetes
item.author: thqnhat@outlook.com (Nhat Tong)
item.description: Enable IP forwarding on all worker nodes sudo sysctl net.ipv4.conf.all.forwarding=1 echo "net.ipv4.conf.all.forwarding=1" | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf Install Weave Net in the cluster (on the controller server) kubectl apply -f "https://cloud.weave.works/k8s/net?k8s-version=$(kubectl version | base64 | tr -d '\n')&env.IPALLOC_RANGE=10.200.0.0/16" kubectl get pods -n kube-system Test networking Create a deployment cat << EOF | kubectl apply --kubeconfig admin.kubeconfig -f - apiVersion: apps/v1 kind: Deployment metadata: name: nginx spec: selector: matchLabels: run: nginx replicas: 2 template: metadata: labels: run: nginx spec: containers: - name: my-nginx image: nginx ports: - containerPort: 80 EOF Create a service on top of this deployment kubectl expose deployment/nginx Verify that the networking is working
